comment:
* Thrown when an error occurs during a Bluetooth Socket related exception. * *

This is currently only intended to be thrown for a failure during {@link * BluetoothSocket#connect()} operation.

variables.name: UNSPECIFIED
variables.comment:
* Error code representing a failure during {@link BluetoothSocket}. The reason for failure
     * isn't specified.

variables.name: L2CAP_UNKNOWN
variables.comment:
* Error code during connect when socket connection fails for unknown reason during L2CAP
     * connection.

variables.name: L2CAP_ACL_FAILURE
variables.comment: Error code during connect when there is an ACL connection failure.

variables.name: L2CAP_CLIENT_SECURITY_FAILURE
variables.comment:
* Error code during connect when security clearance fails on the client during L2CAP
     * connection.

variables.name: L2CAP_INSUFFICIENT_AUTHENTICATION
variables.comment:
* Error code during connect when authentication fails on the peer device during L2CAP
     * connection.

variables.name: L2CAP_INSUFFICIENT_AUTHORIZATION
variables.comment:
* Error code during connect when authorization fails on the peer device during L2CAP
     * connection.

variables.name: L2CAP_INSUFFICIENT_ENCRYPT_KEY_SIZE
variables.comment:
* Error code during connect indicating insufficient encryption key size on the peer device
     * during L2CAP connection.

variables.name: L2CAP_INSUFFICIENT_ENCRYPTION
variables.comment:
* Error code during connect for insufficient encryption from the peer device during L2CAP
     * connection.

variables.name: L2CAP_INVALID_SOURCE_CID
variables.comment:
* Error code during connect for invalid Channel ID from the peer device during L2CAP
     * connection.

variables.name: L2CAP_SOURCE_CID_ALREADY_ALLOCATED
variables.comment:
* Error code during connect for already allocated Channel ID from the peer device during L2CAP
     * connection.

variables.name: L2CAP_UNACCEPTABLE_PARAMETERS
variables.comment:
* Error code during connect for unacceptable Parameters from the peer device during L2CAP
     * connection.

variables.name: L2CAP_INVALID_PARAMETERS
variables.comment:
* Error code during connect for invalid parameters from the peer device during L2CAP
     * connection.

variables.name: L2CAP_NO_RESOURCES
variables.comment: Error code during connect when no resources are available for L2CAP connection.

variables.name: L2CAP_NO_PSM_AVAILABLE
variables.comment: Error code during connect when no PSM is available for L2CAP connection.

variables.name: L2CAP_TIMEOUT
variables.comment: Error code during connect when L2CAP connection timeout.

variables.name: BLUETOOTH_OFF_FAILURE
variables.comment: Error code during connect when Bluetooth is off and socket connection is triggered.

variables.name: SOCKET_MANAGER_FAILURE
variables.comment: Error code during connect when socket manager is not available.

variables.name: SOCKET_CLOSED
variables.comment: Error code during connect when socket is closed.

variables.name: SOCKET_CONNECTION_FAILURE
variables.comment: Error code during connect for generic socket connection failures.

variables.name: NULL_DEVICE
variables.comment: Error code during connect when null device attempts to do socket connection.

variables.name: RPC_FAILURE
variables.comment: Error code during connect when a Runtime RPC exception occurs.

variables.name: UNIX_FILE_SOCKET_CREATION_FAILURE
variables.comment: Error code during connect when the UNIX socket connection creation fails.

variables.name: UNSPECIFIED_MSG
variables.comment: Corresponding messages for respective error codes.

methods.name: public int getErrorCode()
methods.comment: Returns the error code associated to this failure.

methods.name: private static String getMessage(@ErrorCode int code)

methodNames: private static String getMessage(@ErrorCode int code)
